Articles.Content:
Ok so after waiting for my post to appear, and it failing to do so, i thought i would try again.. apologies if this leads to a double post

Last nights mission lead jeb to new and exotic location, taking stock parts to areas they were never meant to go, facing conditions well outside the technical specifications, pushing the boundary of what is possible

Join me in this vid for some banter, tribulations and just a bit of success as I try to plumb the depths
It's a cool sub. I suggest using more struts though, that'll help with travelling in the water. I liked the dishes better open.

The glider was the highlight for me, it may soon appear in my game as the Stohlen Eagle.

What can I say, Stohlen Concepts is a slightly dodgy company who 'produce' concepts suspiciously similar to other peoples ideas...

Good to see another incomplete idiot (aside from my housemate and I) trying to make sububmarines in a space game XD

Struts are essential for strength and stability, lace it up like a Victorian corset.

Dishes open, could rotate forwards and mount on small structural cube.

I have to go now, my planet needs me. And a new glider.
